text: A sex offender, also known as a sexual offender, sex abuser or sexual abuser, is a person who has committed a sex crime. What is seen as a sex crime differs by culture and country. In many cases, there will be a place where it will be logged, so that people convicted may for example not work with children. Crimes which usually cause you to be called a sex offender include sexual assault, child sexual abuse, rape, incest and bestiality. Category:Sex offenders
title: Sex offender
